name: huggingface_scrape_trending
description: Browse trending models, datasets, or spaces on Hugging Face.

steps.code: const items = []; const cards = document.querySelectorAll('article, main a[href]:has(h4)'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(cards.length, 20); i++) { const card = cards[i]; const titleEl = card.querySelector('h4'); if (!titleEl) continue; const spans = Array.from(card.querySelectorAll('span')); const link = card.closest('a[href]') || card.querySelector('a[href]') || card; items.push({ rank: items.length + 1, name: titleEl.textContent.trim(), url: link.href || '', meta: spans.slice(0, 5).map(s => s.textContent.trim()).filter(Boolean) }); } return { category: '{{category}}', items }
